About Me

Ink & Dash

Copywriter for small businesses

Hey!

Super happy you're here. I'm Catherine but I have to make it a bit tricky for you. My nickname is Cassie and I often go by Cas.

I'm a full-time freelance copywriter who also loves writing free verse poems. In 2017, I graduated with a degree in journalism and soon landed a job that allowed me to write for a diverse portfolio of brands, such as Ford and Caterpillar. I've also worked for The Hershey Company as their online retail content writer and blogger for the Hersheyland website. Aside from writing, you can ask me anything about sustainability, let me love all the animals in the world, give me an endless way to travel or put me in front of a typewriter and I'll be one happy chook (chicken). Want to know more? Follow my travel experiences at @catherineputt or poetry work at @ink_and_dash on Instagram.

My story

After graduating university with a degree in journalism and public relations, I knew I wanted to travel. I bought a one-way ticket to Australia, lived in Sydney for a year and later traveled to New Zealand for a month. That year-long adventure was my aha moment of realizing I wanted to see the world while still pursuing my passion for writing. And here we are! Now, I'm able to partner with incredible brands like you, whether you need SEO copywriting services, blog article writing or content proofreading.

To learn more about the different types of copywriting, go check out what I do.

What I Do

Plain and simple, I write darn good copy to fit your brand. Because I'm able to write about any given topic, I am a "subject matter expert". I refer to myself as someone who loves writing about many different topics. It's the most interesting way to learn while providing your brand with top tier written copy. From professional and effective press releases to social media writing and creative copywriting, I'm here to support your growing business.

Learn More

Although I am based in Denver Colorado, I have plenty of clients all ove the world! Let's chat!
